title: Photolysis of tolfenamic acid in aqueous and organic solvents: a kinetic study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21383-21397
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01369G, Paper

Sadia Hafeez Kazi, Muhammad Ali Sheraz, Zubair Anwar, Syed Ghulam Musharraf, Sofia Ahmed, Raheela Bano, Tania Mirza, Kyuyoung Heo, Jun-Hee Na
The photolysis of tolfenamic acid (TA) in aqueous and organic solvents formed 17 photoproducts, of which 9 were reported for the first time.
